com.adobe.creativesdk.typekit

Class AdobeTypekitFontBrowser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.creativesdk.typekit.AdobeTypekitFontBrowser

  • public class AdobeTypekitFontBrowser
extends java.lang.Object
    AdobeTypekitFontBrowser is the class through which user interacts with Font Browser component. Font Browser displays all font families available to the user. Tapping on a family takes the user to the family details view, which displays the different styles in the family. Syncing a font from the details view adds it to the userâ€™s synced fonts set, which is accessible via AdobeTypekitFont.getFonts().
